# User defined functions

```{r}
# Helper function (put this at the top of your script)
save_if <- function(plot_object, filename, width, height, ...) {
  if (save_plots) {
    ggsave(plot = plot_object,
           filename = filename,
           width = width,
           height = height,
           dpi = 300)
  }
}
# change to TRUE to save plots
save_plots <- TRUE
```

# Load required Seurat object

```{r}
e11_control <- readRDS(file.path(out_dir, "e11_control.rds"))

stopifnot(inherits(e11_control, "Seurat"))

Idents(e11_control) <- "seurat_clusters"
Idents(e11_control) <- factor(Idents(e11_control))
DefaultAssay(e11_control) <- "RNA"

# Save the existing Seurat clusters
e11_control$full_dataset_clusters <- e11_control$seurat_clusters

```

```{r}
celltype_cols <- c("Myocardium" = "#E41A1C",

                   "Endocardium" = "#FF7F00",

epicardial_genes <- c("Wt1", "Upk3b", "Apela", "Upk1b", "Aldh1a2")
```

# Re-embed Normalise, find variable features, scale, PCA, UMAP, cluster and visualise
## E11_control

```{r}
# quick dimplot using the existing clusters
DimPlot(e11_control,
        group.by = "seurat_clusters")

n_dims = 30
# Re-computation of graph-based clustering and UMAP on the cleaned dataset
re_embed_e11_control <- FindVariableFeatures(e11_control,
                                        selection.method = "vst", 
                                        nfeatures = 3000,
                                        verbose = FALSE) %>%
  ScaleData(features = rownames(e11_control),
            verbose = FALSE) %>%
  RunPCA(verbose = FALSE) %>%
  FindNeighbors(dims = 1:n_dims,
                verbose = FALSE) %>%
  RunUMAP(dims = 1:n_dims,
          verbose = FALSE)


# Identify the 10 most highly variable genes
top10 <- head(VariableFeatures(e11_control), 10)

# plot variable features with and without labels
plot1 <- VariableFeaturePlot(e11_control)
plot2 <- LabelPoints(plot = plot1,
                     points = top10,
                     repel = TRUE) +
  labs(
    title = "e11_control (3000 variable genes)",
    caption = "e11_control"
    ) +
  NoLegend()
plot2

VizDimLoadings(e11_control,
               dims = 1:2,
               reduction = "pca")

DimPlot(e11_control,
        reduction = "pca") + 
  NoLegend()

DimHeatmap(e11_control,
           dims = 1:6,
           cells = 500,
           balanced = TRUE)

ElbowPlot(e11_control)

```

```{r}
# plot the umap with old cluster numbers and colours
umap_oldCluster <- DimPlot(re_embed_e11_control,
        reduction = "umap",
        group.by = "full_dataset_clusters",
        label = TRUE,
        label.size = 6
        ) +
  labs(
    title = "E11_control - new embedding (old clusters)",
    caption = "E11_control"
  ) +
  NoLegend()
save_if(umap_oldCluster,
        filename = file.path(out_dir, "09-umap.re_embed_e11_control.old_clusters.png"),
        width = 8,
        height = 8)

# plot the umap with new celltypes

        reduction = "umap",
        group.by = "new_celltypes",
        label = TRUE,
        label.size = 6
        ) +
  labs(
    title = "E11_control - new embedding (new celltypes)",
    caption = "E11_control"
  ) +

  NoLegend()
umap_newCelltype
```
